Name: SUDMEX_CONN: The Mexican dataset of cocaine use disorder patients.
HowToAcknowledge: Cite 1st paper: Garza-Villarreal, E. A., M. M. Chakravarty, B. Hansen, S. F. Eskildsen, G. A. Devenyi, D. Castillo-Padilla, T. Balducci, et al. 2017. “The Effect of Crack Cocaine Addiction and Age on the Microstructure and Morphology of the Human Striatum and Thalamus Using Shape Analysis and Fast Diffusion Kurtosis Imaging.” Translational Psychiatry 7 (5): e1122–e1122.
Acknowledgements: We would like to thank Ernesto Reyes Zamorano and Isabel Espinoza Luna for their assistance. We also thank the Laboratorio Nacional deVisualización Científica Avanzada (LAVIS) for the use of their computer cluster and the Laboratorio Nacional de Imagenología por Resonancia Magnética (LANIREM). Thanks also to Francisco J.Pellicer Graham, Margarita López-Titla, Aline Leduc, Erik Morelos-Santana, Lya Paas, Daniela Casillas, Sarael Alcauter, Luis Concha and Bernd Foerster. We also thank Rocio Estrada Ordoñez and Isabel Lizarindari Espinosa Luna at the Unidad de Atención Toxicologica Xochimilco for alltheir help and effort. Finally, we thank the study participants for their cooperationand patience. This project was funded by CONACYT-FOSISS project No. 0201493 and CONACYT-Cátedras project No. 2358948.
